option.name: originalContent
option.value:
server: port: 8092
spring: application: name: alibaba-deepseek-demo
# 静态资源配置 web: resources: static-locations: classpath:/static/ cache: period: 0
# MVC配置 mvc: static-path-pattern: /** view: prefix: / suffix: .html
# 添加数据库配置 datasource: url: jdbc:h2:mem:testdb driver-class-name: org.h2.Driver username: sa password:
h2: console: enabled: true path: /h2-console
jpa: database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.H2Dialect hibernate: ddl-auto: create-drop show-sql: true
ai: openai: # 这写你自己的api！ api-key: sk-yrihxgdcfjrhjdzknhyteeblftqshdrcphjzehnljshiiipu base-url: https://api.siliconflow.cn chat: options: model: Qwen/Qwen2.5-72B-Instruct
# 日志配置 logging: level: root: INFO org.springframework: DEBUG com.fox: DEBUG
